channel.title: Revised #6
channel.description:
Here's a revised edition in PDF and DOCX format (I didn't feel like reformatting it with BBCode.) I fixed most grammatical errors; however, there are still quite a few in the piece. I left those there because I felt changing it would heavily modify TabbyKiller's voice in the piece.
[url=http://projectrainbow.biz/downloads/RevisedCopy.docx]DOCX Format[/url] [url=http://projectrainbow.biz/downloads/RevisedCopy.pdf]PDF Format[/url]
Edit: You'll need to reformat it for the blog format.

item.title: Revised #6
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This is the markdown editor I use: http://dillinger.io/
Also, thanks for the update, I’ll hand it over to Moparisthebest sometime today.

Read full topic

item.title: Revised #6
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Thanks for doing this. In future, if you want to get a copy of the post in markdown, you can go here: https://github.com/moparisthebest/www.moparisthebest.com/tree/master/source/_posts. Submitting posts in markdown makes it a lot easier for everyone

Read full topic
